member.name: WICHeifHdrProperties
member.summary: Specifies the HDR properties of a High Efficiency Image Format (HEIF) image.

member.name: WICHeifHdrProperties.WICHeifHdrMaximumLuminanceLevel
member.summary: [VT_UI2] Specifies the maximum luminance level of the content in Nits.

member.name: WICHeifHdrProperties.WICHeifHdrMaximumFrameAverageLuminanceLevel
member.summary: [VT_UI2] Specifies the maximum average per-frame luminance level of the content in Nits.

member.name: WICHeifHdrProperties.WICHeifHdrMinimumMasteringDisplayLuminanceLevel
member.summary: [VT_UI2] Specifies the maximum luminance of the display on which the content was authored, in Nits.

member.name: WICHeifHdrProperties.WICHeifHdrMaximumMasteringDisplayLuminanceLevel
member.summary: [VT_UI2] Specifies the maximum luminance of the display on which the content was authored, in Nits.

member.name: WICHeifHdrProperties.WICHeifHdrCustomVideoPrimaries
member.summary: [VT_BLOB] Specifies custom color primaries for a video media type. The value of this property is a structure, returned as an array of bytes (VT_BLOB).
